resources.string:
Age: 29 years
 City of birth: Canals (Valencia)
City residence: Madrid

Hobbies: Technology, clean programming, android news, practicing sports, classical music (I play the clarinet from 10 years), learn languages ​​and philosophy.

Personal Description: Since I finished my studies as a telecommunications engineer, I wanted to move around the world of Android technology, so I started to train self-taught in my free time. Four months later I upload my first app at Play Store, Concerts ON.
This app was done with a double purpose: to give the smallest groups the chance to advertise and to reach more people and, above all, to learn everything related to The world of mobile application development. 
Nowadays, I am working on an Android project and I'm sure that my professional career is going only in that direction, mobility projects (I am open to learning new technologies: React Native, Xamarin, Swift, AngularJS (I already have some experience in this one). 
I consider myself a proactive and over-enthusiastic person with a lot of desire to learn and continue to grow as a professional. Of course, I see my future beyond being a programmer analyst, as I am today. I would like to take charge of the organization of mobility projects (I have already done it on a small scale, in Correos I have a person in my charge), but I think that to be able to organize a project well, it is necessary to know the technology used in it, so I continue to train day by day, reading weeklies like Android Weekly and following different technology pages on facebook or twitter. 
To finish, comment that I have good communicative ability, which has always been very useful to me to talk with the client.
The CV is translated english actually
El currículum ja està traduït al català
El currículum ya está traducido al castellano
